description: This rule detects a suspicious crash of the Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: MsMpEng.exe can crash when C:\ is full
name: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Crash
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND ((Provider_Name:"Application\ Error" AND winlog.event_id:"1000") OR (Provider_Name:"Windows\ Error\ Reporting" AND winlog.event_id:"1001")) AND (*MsMpEng.exe* AND *mpengine.dll*))
